byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Nicholas Fandos and Emmarie Huetteman from Washington, Rick Rojas from New York, Gary Gately from Baltimore, Jon Hurdle from Philadelphia and Daniel Heyman from Charleston, W.Va.

abstract: Cities along East Coast prepare for massive Winter Storm Jonas, which could bring high winds, heavy snowfall, and flooding as it moves up coast.
lead_paragraph: Millions of people along the East Coast braced for travel disruptions and possible power losses. In some areas, as much as two feet of snow may fall.

headline.main: Dire Warnings Along East Coast as Snow Piles Up
headline.print_headline: Dire Warnings Along East Coast as Snow Piles Up

snippet: Millions of people along the East Coast braced for travel disruptions and possible power losses. In some areas, as much as two feet of snow may fall.
